messages: 46b908401111ea4fd08e643e2db3534f (15:56): stain: slideshows in Keynote are designed for specific resolutions

e5130390755c40f095aa1149e6fc7707 (16:17): Do you really want to base your existance around that which is truly non-existant?

e5130390755c40f095aa1149e6fc7707 (16:19): I don't know what your problem with him is.
